name: UpdateConfluentResource
description:
Update a Confluent resource linked to a specified account.

Use this tool to update a Confluent resource associated with a given account by specifying the resource and account IDs.

parameters.name: confluent_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Confluent account associated with the resource to be updated.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Confluent account resource to update.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the resource type of the Confluent resource. Valid values are 'kafka', 'connector', 'ksql', or 'schema_registry'.

value_schema.description: The resource type of the Resource. Can be `kafka`, `connector`, `ksql`, or `schema_registry`.

parameters.name: confluent_resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Confluent resource to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID associated with a Confluent resource.

parameters.name: resource_data_type
parameters.description: The JSON:API type for this request. Must be 'confluent-cloud-resources'.

value_schema.description: The JSON:API type for this request.

parameters.name: tags_list
parameters.description: A list of tags for the resource. Each tag can be a single key or a key-value pair separated by a colon.

value_schema.description: A list of strings representing tags. Can be a single key, or key-value pairs separated by a colon.

parameters.name: enable_custom_metrics
parameters.description: Set to true to enable the `custom.consumer_lag_offset` metric which includes extra metric tags.

value_schema.description: Enable the `custom.consumer_lag_offset` metric, which contains extra metric tags.
